website_summaries.verdict: An attractive choice, in all senses of the word, for customers who don't need as much support.
pros: More feminine in design and colors than other styles
Comes in Black on Black, Black and Blush, or Brown and Peach
Woven polyester straps, triple-density EVA construction, anatomical arch support, and EVA outsole

customer_reviews.title: Are these genuine reef brand?
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure these are not genuine reef sandals. The logo on the footbed has a square around it. Also the tread does not contain the "reef" tread. Spend the extra $10 and make sure you're getting the brand you're paying for.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Slipping hazard!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many times I have almost slipped stepping out of my car into the driveway (a dry driveway, not wet) or from a carpet to the hard wood floor or even just walking in the house with these flip flops!!!! The bottoms seem to have some sort of fabric layer that apparently makes it super simple to slide, which is terrible!!! I have decided to stop wearing them so I don't end up hurting myself! I didn't have this problem with my old Reefs. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: What happened!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been wearing these sandals for over 10 years and love them... WTF did you guys do??? they were perfect the way they were... So i ordered a pair directly from Reef and they are exactly the same. So i guess that means they arent fakes... but that also means that Reef lost their minds and tried to fix something that wasn't broken. SO SO SAD!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels like a cheap knock off, but it's not
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of this exact same Reef flip flops over the last 5 years and this one is different than the other two. It fits poorly. Has thin, non-cushioned upper material (the previous pairs had thicker cushiony insulated straps), and they are decidedly uncomfortable. My teenage daughter is wearing and doesn't have issues like me, a mom who has thinner skin and needs more comfort than looks. Heck, even the looks are much less quality too. Disappointed with the quality which is not up to the Reef standards I am used to. And I would have NEVER paid $28 for these cheezy flip flops knowing this. I will look and buy in-person next time
customer_reviews.author: M. T-B

customer_reviews.title: Changed AGAIN - Again Not For The Better
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Reef Ginger flip flops for over a decade. They keep changing them and not for the better. I've always purchased a size 11. First they changed the grippy sole to the near death slip sole -I still bought new pairs. This size 11 when held up to the pair I bought a year ago are not only smaller but also more narrow. Why keep changing a product for the worst?? I've read countless reviews (which I agree with) about how much better the old style of sole is. Now they're shrinking the size? Who would be happy about this? Get it together Reef - you're losing loyal customers.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: straps tend to break
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelingson these. I love the fit and look, and they are comfortable. But this is the 4th time buying the same exact shoe! My first pair lasted 7-8 years with heavy daily walking around the city. My next pair lasted maybe 2 years before a strap broke (with far less waking), and my 3rd pair lasted less than a year before the strap broke. I keep buying hoping it's just bad luck, and because I love the fit and feel, but if this pair does the same I'll have to find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: my go-to water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I frequent the river and beach often. my go-to used to be rainbow sandals but the leather dried out so quickly due to water, salt or sun that i opted for something cheaper and durable. these are awesome. the foam bottoms are dense and secure. the straps are woven and sturdily attached to the lower. ive used several seasons now and have not noticed any cracking, smell or discoloration. definitely would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An oldie but a goodie
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this same style for years; usually in black, but the brown were nice as well. I like them because I have high arches, and there is a fair amount of arch support on these. They are durable, as I wear them daily, and it takes years to wear down. I have never had a strap break, and I love that they are not wide (no tan lines!). Extra plus for me that they have a wide variety of sizes, because I am a size 11 in womens us (6ft tall), and a lot of sandal lines only go to 10. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CDO

customer_reviews.title: A hazardous shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Reef fan and have a few pairs that I wear around the house and outside. I just ordered the same design and am sliding all around on our hardwood floors and tile floors. I looked at the sole and it's like fabric on the bottom. What are they thinking? They are not safe. I didn't save the packaging, so I guess I'm stuck with these. Such a disappointment. Did the product design folks test these out? Just crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Probably my fav “everyday” flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I tend to wear size 7.5 in all shoes but 8s in flip flops. 7.5 flip flops are usually a little too small. I ordered 8 and they are perfect. Comfortable. Small cushion and arch support. Would order another pair/color once I am ready!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy....but beware of slipping
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are very comfortable and provide the arch support I need that is hard to find in other sandals without sacrificing style. However, these sandals are so dangerous to walk in, I am constantly slipping when changing from different surfaces, and actually fell one of the times I slipped, resulting in an ER visit and 4 stitches in my leg. I might just be accident prone, but beware of slick surfaces if you decide to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Madi Fremont

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: The footbed of this particular style is very shaped (slightly narrow), has really nice arch support (support may be slightly low for high arches IMHO), & provides grip even when wet (no sliding around from rain/beach/etc.). Always loved reefs because they last so long, & this thinner strap style is nice change from bulkier looking options. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original Ginger.
customer_reviews.text: Need to order a size bigger then the original Ginger sandals. Totally different fit, and not comfortable at all. Bring back the old style Ginger sandals. This feels like a knockoff!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tung

customer_reviews.title: Terrible New Design: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy these! I’ve had these flips flops For over ten years but this new design is a disaster! Heavy soles on the bottoms and they’re slippery. Don’t even think about wearing these on hardwood. I can to stand these shoes anymore. Reef: fix this problem. I’m guessing They redesigned the soles so they’d last longer but now they’re awful.
customer_reviews.author: HStark

customer_reviews.title: broke!
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I have worn reefs for about 15 years. They have always been good quality and lasted through constant use. This pair though only lasted me a couple of months of light use and then the toe connection pulled out while I was walking through a parking lot. There is no way for it to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing has shrunk even more!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 7 to replace my worn out size 7. The new ones straps are much tighter around my foot than my old ones ever were and the shoe bed is about 1/4” shorter in length. I’d suggest ordering at least a half size up from your current ones (if you have them), and 1 full size if you haven’t worn these before as they did run small (now are smaller). I still love these because of the excellent arch support which is difficult to find in a flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Dlcc

customer_reviews.title: New design
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Reef Ginger flip flops at least three times but this pair is stiffer and the thong part less comfy than any other pair. Rather than slipping right on, I have to fuss with the strap so it doesn't flip over on top of my foot. Not thrilled. Wore my others into the ground but these don't get much wear at all. Won't buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: KMulqs

customer_reviews.title: Love these, great arch support
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these 2x now. I lost the other pair after having them for 3 years with no problems. They are sturdy, comfortable and have a nice arch. I originally bought these when I was having problems with foot pain, flat flip-flops were making it worse so I bought these. Best purchase ever, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Christine

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great longevity and worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: When I was pregnant in 2003 my feet swelled up so horribly these were the only shoes I could wear - I have continued to use them over the past 17 years (the same pair!) and was sad when I couldn’t find them this summer. Thankfully amazon had them - they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these sandals for years and I usually buy a new pair every year or two because I wear them so much that I wear them out. Cute and super comfortable. I can wear these for long walks and never get any blisters. My only complaint is they seem to have changed the tread design on the bottoms and these can be a bit slippery on smooth surfaces - like hardwood stairs. I have definitely almost wiped out a couple times but I'm sure that will improve once I scuff up the bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel  Cambio

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these reef sandals for years, and just replace them as they fall apart or whatever. I’m a 7.5/8 and I usually buy an 8. The straps on the 8 were too tight, the width of the shoe was about 1/4 -1/3 inch smaller than the one I currently have. I exchanged them for a size 9!!!! Straps are looser, not terribly, but my foot actually fits on the full length of the sandal, and width. My only worry is that the strap will be too loose as I wear them in...
customer_reviews.author: Bayje Green

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my Gingers!
customer_reviews.text: Reef Gingers are my favorite flip-flops in the world. I’ve owned several pairs so far and worn most of them for 2 years or more almost every day from late spring to early fall. Only one individual shoe strap has failed prematurely so far. They are soft with great arch support and they mold to your feet. What more can you ask for? I only wish they came in some snazzy color options like black with fuschia or turquoise straps.
customer_reviews.author: beisbol fan

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality has Declined
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reef Ginger flip flops for over 20 years. They are the most comfortable flip flops. Sadly, the quality has declined over the past couple years. My last 2 pairs did not even last 1 year. The straps separated from the sole in both pairs. I only wear them in Summer months, so it was really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these flip flops over and over for at least the past 10 years!! A few different pairs, that is! When the strap just came off of my current ones, I was pleased to see they are still making these. They mold to your feet and are so soft. Great for my flat feet. I get a few years of wear off of each pair. Please do not ever discontinue!
customer_reviews.author: kel858

customer_reviews.title: Amazons Deceitful Knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn Reef Ginger’s . I’m questioning if these are even real?? In one week I’ve slipped and fell badly from the bottom tread on these being extremely slick. I’m not satisfied one bit with these & disappointed in Amazon selling more & more knockoffs lately.
customer_reviews.author: Amber T.

customer_reviews.title: Run small IMO
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8.5 in sandals. So I ordered a 9. Although the arch support and cushion on them are really nice the straps feel like they are too close together which makes it feel tighter and smaller. I’ve always ordered ROXY brand but this was my first time buying Reefs maybe reefs run smaller IDK but I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing . Potentially fake .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in my normal size to replace my old pair . They were an entire size too small . My foot was hanging off the sides to the point I double checked thinking the wrong size was shipped . Nope . Would not by from here again
customer_reviews.author: flexiest

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up!
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Reef Ginger sandals for years. I think this may be my 7th pair? I have always worn a size 8 but with the latest pair I had to return and get a size 9 because they were smaller than my old pairs. I matched them up with the older pairs and they are a bit smaller. The sole of the sandal looks different than it used to. Haven't worn them yet but they seem the same otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: kb25

customer_reviews.title: Love my Reefs
customer_reviews.text: Love the flip flop, the color. The straps (made out of recycled plastic) was a bit tight when first worn. I wore them around hoping they'd loosen up a bit. They did. I'm used to the really nice gooshy footbed so it'll take a little wearing to get used to the arch. Overall, I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best flip flops for arch support!
customer_reviews.text: Love these flips flops!! The archers are perfect for my throbbing knees! It is just enough ache that I can feel the support that my back needs! I tried other brands and they just don’t compare to the ginger reef not the slim! I only wish they made more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Runs small compared to my other Reef flip flops. 🤔
customer_reviews.text: I returned them because the shoe was marked size 8 but was more like a size 7. When I compared to my other pair that I bought in an actual Reef Retail store it was definitely running small. I’ll buy my next pair from an official Reef retail store to be sure of the size and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Shickama

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: A little snug and don't love the skinny straps as much as thicker ones I have had in previous purchases. Had an injury on to of my entire foot, needed shoes with little coverage on top and these were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef sandals, I have only had the Ginger style but recieved some comfort ones this summer, I love them too! I ordered these navy ginger style to replace my original pair that I bought over 7-8 years ago that finally broke. I glued the strap back in and continue to wear those. These definitely hold up to major use and I love the arch support! Always my go to flip flops!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tcal

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is Off
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of Reefs and have always been a size 6 but this sandal was oddly fitted. The footbed is the right size, so it would be too large if I went any bigger, but the length of the straps was extremely short and shallow and therefore very tight. I can't imagine these fitting anyone, you'd have to have a very low-depth foot like a child, but then have the width and length of a normal adult.
customer_reviews.author: WayNorth

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love the Reef brand, but was not a big fan of these. The cloth straps seemed to feel loose on my feet. I'm sure they work for some people, just not for me. I guess i need to stick to the wider cloth straps or the plastic straps.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Fit way too small
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked the sandals, they were comfy and just what I wanted. And I love Reefs. BUT I'm a size 6 in every shoe I've ever bought (sandals, wedges, heels, cowboy boots, running shoes) so I ordered a 6. It came and they were way too small, so I was bummed. They were quick to let me return, which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Reef flip flops for over 40 years, I love them. Now they’ve started putting arch support in them. I’m sure that’s fine for most people but not for me. After about 30 minutes of wearing them my feet hurt so bad I have to take them off. I have flat feet & cant wear shoes that have an arch in them.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmosmom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but, big arch!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable but, must be known it has a decent amount of an arch support in it. I saw these while I was on vacation but, didn't feel like spending $25 on flip flops. I couldn't stop thinking about them though so I looked them up online and found them here. Super happy I did because I love them!
customer_reviews.author: MARISA BISACCIA

customer_reviews.title: Order up
customer_reviews.text: Love the slight arch support and thin straps. But I ordered a size 7 and they fit like a 6. I always wear 7’s in flip flops. The straps are too tight and my foot literally sits on the back edge of the flip flop. I wore them thinking the straps would loosen and my foot would be sit further forward but that hasn’t happened. Can’t return them because they’ve been worn (my bad!)
customer_reviews.author: RKM

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size small
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews- order a full size bigger than your normal size- these run very small. The straps rub the top of my foot more than my old reefs, but I’m hoping they’ll break in, but like the old ones they’re comfortable between my toes. The soles are a little thicker than the old ones which makes them more comfortable to stand in.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: ... buying Reef Ginger sandals for a long time and love them. However this pair I bought most recently ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Reef Ginger sandals for a long time and love them. However this pair I bought most recently I'm not as thrilled with. The strap on the left sandal seems to be a little higher than the right one and feels sort of 'loose' on my foot as a result. I have another still brand new pair that I compared it with to make sure it wasn't my imagination. I don't hate it enough to go through the hassle of returning them, but it is annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny B.

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around flip flop
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I buy a new pair every summer since I burn them out from wearing them ALL THE TIME. Lightweight (not clunky) and goes with everything, from shorts and bathing suits to maxi dresses and cute skirts. They have never once given me blisters, where so many other flip flops have. Contrary to what other reviewers are saying, each of my purchased pairs have always been the same size and they run true to size for my foot (9). I will keep buying these as long as they keep making them!

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit I realize I prefer my broken in flip flops better but it isn't because these don't fit or have support its because I walk awkwardly in flip flops, strange right. These flip flops have great support and fit amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara hauber

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Reef flip flops for years and absolutely love them! I bought a pair of Ginger sandals years ago that are finally wearing out. I ordered my usual size 9 shoes that I wear. After putting them on, I noticed that they were super small--tight under the straps and the shoe is short. I should have ordered one whole size up to have them fit like my old size 9s. Why did they change the sizing? I sent these back and didn't even reorder a larger pair. Sad to say, but maybe it is time for me to branch out from Reef sandals.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer208

customer_reviews.title: These run 2 sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: They need to adjust the size on these. I wear a true 9 1/2 and I ordered an 11 because I like my flip flops big because they are just more comfy that way. I don't like my heel right at the edge or hanging off! The size 11 was smaller than my regular shoe size, my heel was a tad bit over the edge. I had to return them. I gave them a 2 because they are cute but run REALLY SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: T. VanV

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit right in two different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal shoe size, 10, and these were too short on my foot. I reordered an 11, and they were too loose on the top. I had to return them. Still on the hunt for a good flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do fit me, although I do want to add that they seem a little smaller than the previous pair of Reef's I had that were very similar. I had those for several years, and loved them. These so far are the same, comfort-wise. Very comfortable and have decent support, especially for flip flops. My last pair I even wore daily for a week at Disney World a couple years ago, if that tells you about their comfort level for me. I finally had to replace those when the strap in between my toes on one of them came out. They had a good run, though. Reef flip flops are my favorite for comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: jls

customer_reviews.title: Arch support makes them comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got the ginger. Color is just as depicted. More importantly, these are very comfortable flip flops. Arch support is great and I find I can stand/walk in these for long periods without foot fatigue. I got 1 size larger than normal, based on reviews and they fit fine, so maybe size up?
customer_reviews.author: D. Wall

customer_reviews.title: A real flop of a product
customer_reviews.text: Just want to let people know that I purchased these sandals for vacation. 4 days into my vacation the bottom peaked away, so unhappy. I have had reef sandals before and have never had this happen. I’m not sure why they feel apart but I won’t be buying them again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Del Bianco

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable flip flop, leather-free, consistently high quality construction. The dainty woven strap reduces the appearance of foot tan lines, and won't irritate your skin. No annoying rubber thing between your toes! I always have a pair of Gingers in my closet, always.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Turn your feet black
customer_reviews.text: They will turn the bottom of your feet nasty black. I love the ginger style sandals, but the all black ones turn my feet black after a day of use. It’s disgusting and totally embarrassing if others see them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon1218

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!
customer_reviews.text: They're a bit smaller than I expected for a size 7, but I have tiny feet, so it works! Also they have awesome arch support, and for someone who hates wearing tennis shoes and would rather go barefoot or in flip flops, AND who has high arches, these flip flops are so insanely comfortable. I went from wearing a croc pair of flip flops that were worn basically every day for two years until they broke (and are now discontinued) these have been an awesome replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe O.

customer_reviews.title: Loyal wearer!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my 4th pair of the same sandal. I buy a new pair every summer. The arch support is wonderful. They do wear down after a season of wearing, but i'm tough on my sandals. I walk a LOT in the city and I wear these everywhere. I'm ok with needing a new pair after a season for the reasonable price. I always go with plain black - they go with everything from my yoga clothes to a sundress. The thin strap of this style look more feminine and dressier than the classic thick strap.
customer_reviews.author: RJO

customer_reviews.title: True to size and MAD comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm super stoked to have a new pair of Ginger Reef flip flops again! They are super comfy on the feet and dry quickly in case of water. Worth every penny of the $19.93 total cost!
customer_reviews.author: Loren Wood

customer_reviews.title: ☺️🌺☀️ These feel so cozy!
customer_reviews.text: In Hawaii all we ever wear are slippas ☺️🌺☀️ these feel so cozy and have good traction so I never worry about slipping. I also love what they are made out of , they don't disintegrate as so many other types end up doing with this weather. I love how it has a small arch support as our arches end up falling over time. So now I have support.
customer_reviews.author: ~Alex~

customer_reviews.title: Light As Air and Proper Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for flip flops that would provide decent arch support and not look like orthopedic shoes. These Reef sandals are perfect. They required zero breaking in time, and are super comfortable. They weigh practically nothing. The arch support is just what I needed, and the straps are comfortable and do not cause blistering. I heeded the advice of others and ordered a size up. I normally wear an 8 or 8.5, and the 9 fits me well. The straps could be a tad bit tighter, but I have narrow feet and am used to extra wiggle room. These are a great deal for the money, and so far are holding up very well. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Buttrcp

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit?!?
customer_reviews.text: Are these counterfeit?!? I’m not sure what gives here, but the fit, comfort, & quality are terrible compared to the “same” Reef sandals I’ve worn for years. Incredibly disappointed. It was my go-to Flip Flop, & I always knew what I was getting. The sizing is off. Something about the footbed is odd. The arch support seems off & I’ll fitting. The straps are tighter & material uncomfortable. It’s a total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Yes! They do run small. I wear a solid 9, but because of other reviews I ordered a 10. Glad I did. Also, note that you cannot slide your foot in this flip flops. You must use your hands to hold the straps apart to put your foot in them. The straps are on top of the shoe not coming out of the sides. If you have a wide foot don’t even think about it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Old School Flip Flops
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and comfortable flip flops. They have a nice thick sole and the straps are fabric and are soft on your feet and in between your toes. I actually bought two of the same shoe, just different sizes and they both fit (I usually wear a size 6 but in flip flops I wear a 5-6). One pair for around the house or on the beach and one for when I'm a little dressed up. I live in Florida so flip flops are almost a year round shoe. The color is really pretty - sort of a teal/aqua color which is right on for the summer colors that are popular right now.
customer_reviews.author: HSM

customer_reviews.title: You will never buy another brand of flip flops again - these are the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing the Reef Flip Flops with the thin band since 1998. I LOVE THEM. The thinner band that is soft and flat makes them SUPER comfortable. These flip flops have an arch support in them, which is hard to find in a flip flop. The arch support combined with the soft band, makes you feel like you aren't wearing anything. Plus, unlike other flip flops, which hardly have any sole grip and the bottom and can be slippery, these have a great textured sole. The textured sole makes them grip the ground better, so you're less likely to trip in slippery areas. They also last FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: asd121

customer_reviews.title: MADE ME OFF BALANCE
customer_reviews.text: The straps cut into my foot and the wonky arch support made me totally off balance. They were so uncomfortable. And the straps were soo flimsy that it required effort and both hands to put them on my feet. Not what one wants with flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: ruth fruehauf

customer_reviews.title: Great flip flops in the past.
customer_reviews.text: Reef changed the sizing and style. They placed a rubber logo on the strap and when the strap gets twisted on your foot, the rubber logo causes discomfort or it will scratch your foot. Reef took a simple flip flop that everyone loved and made it complicated so they can have brand recognition. The sad part is they already had it.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: These sandals have changed, but are still great.
customer_reviews.text: My mother and I each buy a pair of these every year, always in the same size. For some reason this year, we both had to buy a size larger because they are no longer made as they were in the past. They are now a size smaller and have a harder bottom. Still love them nonetheless, but be advised the size is now different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size up one size
customer_reviews.text: I had to exchange these for a size bigger but now they fit perfectly. They are a little more slick on the bottom, especially when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 2 1/2 years now and wear every day (all day when I don't have to work). They still look like new; no visible wear or tear whatsoever after so much use except for my footprint on them. Incredibly sturdy sandals. They're not heavy though not light either, feminine looking, fairly comfortable. After standing in the kitchen for a couple hours (2-3) your feet do start to hurt quite a bit. Would prefer if they were a little more cushy. I wear 9 - 9 1/2, purchased the 9, fits as expected. Overall a great sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Great Flip Flop Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this in my size but they didn't fit and painfully rubbed - I couldn't even pretend they would work. My niece has smaller feet than me (2 sizes) so I gave them to her and they fit great. I just bought her 2 more pair for her birthday because she wears them everywhere. She walks a lot and these are her main footgear. Now part of it is that I have a wide foot and they don't mae a wide width but they were too small in length too. I gave it 4 stars because my niece says they are the most comfortable flip flops ever even with hard walking/wear.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Love Tevas
customer_reviews.text: I’m a die-hard teva fan for my flip flops and sandles. These do not disappoint! You don’t have hard pieces poking into your foot when the foam-like sole compressed and forms to your foot.
customer_reviews.author: leslie robinson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than ever!
customer_reviews.text: The sandal size says 7 but it is not the same length as the pair I had before. The pair before was slightly too long but still amazingly comfortable. I’m a 6 1/2 but order a size up since half sizes aren’t available. This new pair has been painful to “break in” and now I’m worried about them ever getting comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/Durable Flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Reef flip-flops I've owner and each pair has been comfortable and lasted for years. Durable material and washable/waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: E. Robb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I own over 20 pair of the original ginger style. Two problems with these. 1 I received two right feet. 2 they run a size small and are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size 8 flip-flop fit my size 7.5 feet
customer_reviews.text: Nice flip flops! I normally wear 7.5 sized shoes so I opted to get the size 8 flip flops and they fit great. The arch support was wonderful and provided support where cheaper flip flops fail. I wore these for many walks, on the beach, on rocks, etc and they were very comfortable. My only complaint is that the straps are very thin so I did feel like I was struggling to keep them on at some points. These are cute and perfect for the beach or pool though and if thin straps on flip flops don't bother you, these are definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: psorion

customer_reviews.title: Meh at best.
customer_reviews.text: The thong fits 1/2 size smaller than advertised. The sole is very narrow and foot will hang off at the sides. Great for very narrow feet the long stramp is thin, uncomfortable and itchy because of texture. The thong strap is thin. Not much padding. Great for small feet or using as a glorified doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: Tweeter

customer_reviews.title: Left my feet black
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars, I would. I bought two pairs...they both left my feet BLACK. Sent the first pair back, thought it was a fluke. The second pair arrived, I threw away my packaging and happily put them on my feet, wore them around the house for an hour, then had black stained soles of my feet. Was hard to scrub off. And gross. They are useless and I cannot find the packaging to return them. Sad bc I have bought Reef for years. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: pasadena201

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love reef flip flops. These are the same as the ones I had before but they do run small. I wear a size 9 and ordered a size 9 but in the future I will go up a half size. They have stretched out now that I have been wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Memories of my childhood
customer_reviews.text: I grew up wearing flip flops and in a moment of nostalgia, thought I'd try them again. The last few times I thought I might return to my old favorites left me with sore toes and not a happy feeling. I gave these a five because the straps are made out of very soft material. They just slide right on and make my feet happy, happy, happy! I'd forgotten about that little flop, flop noise the sandal makes as it hits your heel - Brought back old memories. Oh and I wear and 8.5 - Ordered a 9 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Bates

customer_reviews.title: Arch Support.....in a Flip Flop!!!
customer_reviews.text: Flip flops are my favorite for summer, but never knew they could be this comfortable. Only knew of those cheap ones for a few bucks a pair that are uncomfortable and go flat in no time. The arch support in these really makes a tremendous difference in comfort, they seem to conform to your foot, and keep their shape and support. I wear a size 10 narrow but the medium in these stays on a narrow foot just fine. Just ordered a second pair in another style. Yes, would recommend them to anyone who enjoys the freedom of flip flops in much better quality than the ordinary...
customer_reviews.author: prescottsweet

customer_reviews.title: Go-to flip flop for year-round wear
customer_reviews.text: I have bought and re-bought this pair of flip-flops for several years. It's my go-to style; as a Floridian, these are practically year round wardrobe staples. The Ginger model is sleek while still maintaining the Reef "squish" that is so appealing. The strap part is a ribbony-fabric style that is smooth on feet unlike the plastic thongs many similar pairs seem to be favoring now. I especially like this style in black and brown particularly. In my experience these fit true to size, and are best for average to narrower feet.
customer_reviews.author: LiteraryJess

customer_reviews.title: They felt small at first...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was pleasantly surprised by these Reef Flip Flops. I am a devoted Reef wearer but I have never ordered them online. This was a new style of flip flop for me (with the knit like stitching instead of the leather straps) so I wasn't sure if I would like them. I really love them! They felt small at first, however after wearing them around for one day they stretched enough to fit perfectly on my feet. I wear them daily. My last pair of Reefs lasted about 10 years so they are WORTH every penny. I highly recommend getting yourself a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Reef flip flops and these are an excellent pair. The thin straps are perfect for people who have small or narrow feet because they over-power your foot like the thick strap of other flip flops like Rainbow. These flip flops are also very comfortable and form to your feet. The straps on them do not rub or cause blisters either and the flip flop itself is very bendable so it works with you when you walk and won't make your feet feel achy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beason

customer_reviews.title: The perfect flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these flip flops for more than 10 years and am probably on pair 4 or 5 now. I find them perfect for my needs. They're comfortable enough to wear all day and provide some arch support. They mold to your foot so they become even more comfortable after a while. And the straps are light and soft, so they don't dig in even when brand new. The slim straps also look great on the foot and have an understated look. You can wear these with anything...skirts, shorts, dresses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: smartcookie

customer_reviews.title: Reef Ginger = Love
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these for YEARS. I can’t vouch for them enough. I purchase new ones about twice a year and they’re every penny. Can Not imagine life without them🥰💐🎉💙
customer_reviews.author: Konnie F.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Reef Ginger shoes for 20 years and I have always been a size 7. They have definitely changed the sizing because these do not fit like a 7. My heel hangs off the back. I’m so disappointed! Reef has lost a faithful customer. I know I can return them however going to the post office with 4 little kids during a pandemic is not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Gagne

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS
customer_reviews.text: The surface of the outer and inner soles is already deteriorating, I haven't even had these 5 months yet. They cause the bottoms of my feet to to turn black and my skin to crack. I'm throwing them away. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Pineapple Momica

customer_reviews.title: These are not as comfortable as my other reefs
customer_reviews.text: These are not as comfortable as my other reefs. They are too short and it feels like there is something digging into my feet where the strings attach. I don't find myself reaching for them because they really are just uncomfortable and I prefer my $1 Old Navy flip flops instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I have owned at least a dozen pairs of reef ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned at least a dozen pairs of reef flip flops over the years and am sorry to say these are of inferior quality. The sole is made differently and/or of different materials. I usually wear my reefs while boating. The soles of this pair are so slippery that they are not even safe to wear indoors. I slip walking on our hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Mate

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had these flip flops for a year and a half. I wear them all the time. I measure to be a size 9 but I believe I should have gotten a 9.5 because my feet are a little wider than the norm and there is barely enough room for my whole foot! I do have very high arches, so I imagine for someone with an average arch they would provide appropriate arch support. They are very well built, as I said I wear them all the time. I would imagine they would last anywhere from 3-5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Abby L

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking to replace my most comfortable pair of flip flops, (from them wearing out) and these are it! You can feel the arch support, and the padding when walking. The only downside is they're a bit snug. I also don't think they're great with wet floors, but I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beach bum

customer_reviews.title: Slippery sole
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these flip flops for years. They last a long time. However, this most recent pair is very smoith on the bottom and is pretty slippery on our wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Swenson

customer_reviews.title: runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but VERY small in both length- too short, my foot just barely fit on the footbed- and straps very narrow and tight on the front of my foot. They took two hands to get them on and I could tell that the scratchy straps would make a huge blister between my toes. It seemed like they were made for children. I have rarely had trouble finding flip flops that fit properly. I have a very average to narrow foot. Very disappointed. Will try a bigger size because I liked the style/arch support of the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fit is much too small all around
customer_reviews.text: I am a true size 6. I always wear 7 in Reef and Sanuk flip flops bc I like them a little larger rather than smaller. Ordered a size 7 in these and they are too small in every way. Not sure what the deal is but I am returning! If the fit was correct they would be comfy and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: LAswampgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Year-Round
customer_reviews.text: Love these - have had these pairs for years. Always a little tight when first putting on....then stretch and mold to fit your feet perfectly. Love the cushioned arch. Wear especially in the summer outdoors, and inside the house for the months when it's not too cold. After a day out - put in a bucket with hot water & add a little clothes detergent. Soak for about 5 minutes. (Place the detergent bottle on top of them to keep them under the water!) A soft scrub brush. Rinse. Dry overnight, or if in a hurry, wear out again! Nice & clean - great to wear. Will be buying more! Different styles & colors...
customer_reviews.author: Shalimar

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up like other Reefs I've had :(
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii. "Slippahs," aka "flip-flops" are what I wear all day, every day. My old Reefs lasted me over 2 YEARS. These lasted barely 6 MONTHS before the thong part pulled out of the base. Also, the bottom, as other reviewers have mentioned, has some sort of fabric layer that the old ones didn't have. Makes them slippery on damp surfaces. Very sad these didn't live up to expectations. Also annoyed Amazon wouldn't do anything to help me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennette C Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No Flipping on these Reefs
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sandal, I replace these every few years. Lightweight, supportive, and quick-drying. You will find me in these more often than not each summer. I particularly like the thin strip between the toes, anything wider than this is unwearable for me. I also find the bottom tread helpful on wet surfaces. Get these!
customer_reviews.author: FiveSky

customer_reviews.title: I love Reef flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I love Reef flip flops. I was so happy to see them available on Amazon. These last for years. I have 4 pair that I have had for about 8 years. My puppy got a hold of the black pair, so they are relegated to gardening wear. I am pleased to see that the new pair are of the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: I love them so much but they really need replacing
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Reef Gingers purchased many years ago that I have worn into the ground. I love them so much but they really need replacing. Unfortunately, these are simply not the same shoe. I thought maybe it was just my undying love for my old, worn in flips. Years of water & sand have made their mark but it's not just that. The dimensions are actually different. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Flip-Flops!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried unsuccessfully to find flip flops that fit my fit and gave me enough arch support to keep my fee tcomfortable and cool. These are definitely the shoes! I was so excited when they arrived and surprised at how cute they were in the magenta and black. I have almost worn them out this summer and am ordering another pair today. I definitely recommend these for anyone looking for comfort and support without spending a fortune! By the way, I wear an 8.5 and I ordered a 9 and they fit perfectly so I would say definitely go up a half a size. Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice support, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally wear any shoes in the house, but recently began working from home and have fashioned myself a "standing desk." In the past, when I've worked at standing desks, they were in a workplace setting, so I was always wearing supportive shoes. When I stand in place for hours at home, barefoot, I begin to feel it in my feet by the end of the day. I got these flip flops to try and blend the two situations. They work! They're super comfortable, but with the slight amount of support I wanted in order to stand all day without pain.
customer_reviews.author: EGMM

customer_reviews.title: Summer staple
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! I order a new pair every couple of years because I wear them so much in warm weather. The fabric straps are soft and the rubber soles work great as a sandal that can get wet. They have a cushy but supportive sole.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as Reefs bought in the past.
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Reef sandals but these are different than sandals I have bought from them in the past few years. I held these up to last year's sandals and the same size has about a half inch trimmed off all the way around. Sure, my foot still fits on the shoe but just barely. I should have returned them but I was hoping I could make them work. I don't think I will ever wear them in public because it looks like I can't afford to buy shoes that fit. I'm really disappointed with this change in their sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Borho

customer_reviews.title: Older version sooo much better
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair that was 10+ years old. They were much more comfortable and higher quality material. Hate when company takes a great product and screws it up
customer_reviews.author: lisa b

product_meta.title: Reef Women's Ginger Sandals
product_meta.description:
To and from your surf spot or sport destination, travel in comfort with the compression molded triple density construction. The Reef Rover sport sandals for men are the perfect combination of comfort and durabilty. Designed with Reef's Signature SWELLULAR TECHNOLOGY rubber outsole tread pattern mimics the lines of the ocean for traction. The Rover sport sandals for men come in multiple colors to fit your active on-the-go lifestyle. The footbed is outfitted with anatomical arch support to keep you comfortable as expected with mens athletic sandals. The upper soft synthetic nubuck strap has the padded liner making these both comfortable and durable. Reef encourages you to embrace the fun, freedom and spirit of the beach. Our products are designed to make you feel comfortable, relaxed and free in any environment, whether you’re at the beach or not.

Reef is surf. They're inspired by water, by the ocean, by perfect waves, and the journey along the way to find them. They are a genuine, global surf brand that harvests the best of the lifestyle and shares it through authentic, innovative and fashionable product. At the core of Reef is their Latin roots and the inherent sensuality of the beach. The Reef team is committed to having fun in and out of the water, as well as giving back to the world that inspires them.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC FLIP FLOPS: Reef's Bliss-Full flip flops are handcrafted to be with you no matter where your next adventure takes you. The classic design and versatility means you can seamlessly go from brunch to the beach.

SHOE GOALS: The strap upper hugs your foot while the environmentally friendly, PVC free vegan leather is the perfect addition to any outfit. Lay by the pool or have the time of your life at a music festival, these slides will go anywhere with you.
NO BREAK-IN PERIOD: These sandals are made 10% PVC free so they are better for and on the environment and the soft rubber footbed will keep your feet comfortable no matter where they take you.

SUPERIOR STRAP: The soft, slim strap ensures your whole foot is comfortable and you can count on the Bliss Full sandal to go wherever adventure takes you. No matter your style, the variety of coastal and classic colors available means you can find the perfect pair.

BEACH FREELY WITH REEF: We are encouraging people around the world to embrace the fun, freedom and spirit of the beach while living life by one simple rule: Beach Freely. Our products are designed to make you feel comfortable, relaxed and free in any environment, whether you're at the beach or not.
